snippet.title: Grounded Developer Vlog 18 - The Home Stretch
snippet.description:
🏡 Join Shyla, Obsidian's Social Media Manager, as she takes you through the final update before the full release of Grounded. We're in the home stretch now, which coincidentally is the name of this update! Learn about the big new additions going into the game like changes to the weapon and armor upgrade system, the ability to have gnat pets, and the all new shared world feature. Have fun playing with friends but get bummed when the host has to leave and the game ends? No longer as you can now share the world you've all built with each other so you can pop in any time! Learn about these updates and a whole bunch more in this latest vlog.

Grounded will enter its full release in September 2022 on Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Windows 10/11, and Steam for $39.99. It’s also available with Xbox Game Pass and PC Game Pass.

For full patch notes: https://grounded.obsidian.net/news/grounded/grounded-heads-into-the-home-stretch

For more about Grounded: https://grounded.obsidian.net
